name: Punch A Bubble
description:
Punch A Bubble🫧 was created in 3 hours using the Unity game engine, with the goal of improving upon an initial project that only featured a basic ball spawning system.

In this game, your objective is to pop all of the bubbles that appear on the screen and earn points in order to reach the goal of 1000 and win the game. However, you must be careful not to punch the red bubbles, as doing so will cause you to lose points and time.
